shrimpFeed.name: Prestige Shrimp Gold Feed
shrimpFeed.description: Premium feed specifically formulated for shrimp.
shrimpFeed.ingredients: Shrimp meal, fishmeal, soybean meal, vitamins, minerals
shrimpFeed.usage: Feed small amounts multiple times a day, adjusting the quantity based on shrimp size and water conditions.

shrimpFeed.name: Prestige Special Shrimp Feed
shrimpFeed.description: Specialized feed for promoting growth and health of shrimp.
shrimpFeed.ingredients: Shrimp meal, fishmeal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
shrimpFeed.usage: Feed according to the recommended feeding rates based on shrimp size and pond conditions.

shrimpFeed.name: Prestige Premium Shrimp Feed
shrimpFeed.description: High-quality feed to support optimal growth and development of shrimp.
shrimpFeed.ingredients: Shrimp meal, fishmeal, soybean meal, vitamins, minerals
shrimpFeed.usage: Feed multiple times a day, ensuring complete consumption by the shrimp.
